name: Multipurpose Cleaning Spray
description: A 750ml bottle of multipurpose surface cleaner, effective on glass, wood, and kitchen surfaces, with a fresh lemon scent.

name: All-Natural Dishwashing Liquid
description: A 1-liter bottle of eco-friendly dishwashing liquid made with natural ingredients, gentle on hands and tough on grease.

name: Biodegradable Trash Bags (30 Pack)
description: A pack of 30 biodegradable trash bags, 20-liter capacity, designed to reduce plastic waste while maintaining strength and durability.

name: Bamboo Toilet Paper (12 Rolls)
description: A pack of 12 rolls of 100% bamboo toilet paper, soft, strong, and eco-friendly, suitable for daily use.

name: Reusable Water Bottle (1 Liter)
description: A 1-liter reusable stainless steel water bottle with a leak-proof cap, perfect for staying hydrated on the go.

name: Organic Cotton Bath Towels (Set of 2)
description: A set of two large, soft organic cotton bath towels, designed for maximum absorbency and comfort.

name: Stainless Steel Food Storage Containers (Set of 3)
description: A set of three durable, stainless steel food storage containers with airtight lids, perfect for meal prep and leftovers.

name: Organic Green Tea (100 Tea Bags)
description: A box of 100 organic green tea bags, sourced from sustainable farms, known for its refreshing taste and health benefits.

name: Rechargeable LED Desk Lamp
description: A rechargeable LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness, ideal for reading or working with minimal eye strain.

name: Silicone Food Storage Bags (Pack of 5)
description: A set of five reusable silicone food storage bags, perfect for keeping food fresh and reducing plastic waste.

name: All-Purpose Floor Cleaner
description: A 1.5-liter bottle of all-purpose floor cleaner, safe for use on hardwood, tile, and laminate floors with a fresh lavender scent.

name: Ergonomic Memory Foam Pillow
description: A premium memory foam pillow with an ergonomic design for improved neck support and comfort during sleep.
